EmailTemplate.subject: The three challenges with SCADA migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Addressing the 3 biggest SCADA migration challenges Ensure your successful transition As TDM-based networks are being phased out, mission-critical SCADA systems will migrate to packet-based networks like IP/MPLS. This brings three major challenges :
- How to connect with legacy interfaces on SCADA equipment - How to transport and bridge SCADA traffic - How to protect your system from cyber attacks
A proven and viable migration solution <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gP7N52rZWHU]]> is needed to address these challenges. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
